Event.name: UserLogin
Event.HelpText: An end user or administrator logs in to OVD server. This is generated by ldapbind operation.

Event.name: UserLogout
Event.HelpText: An end user or administrator logs out(unbind operation) from OVD server.

Event.name: CheckAuthorization
Event.HelpText: Permissions granted/denied to user for performing an operation against the OVD server.

Attribute.name: ServiceOperation
Attribute.HelpText: Name of the operation performed that changes the service configuration

Event.name: RemoveService
Event.HelpText: Delete an OVD service such as adapter or listener.

Event.name: ModifyServiceConfig
Event.HelpText: Modify or change the configuration of an OVD service such as adapter or ACLs.

Event.name: AddService
Event.HelpText: Add or Deploy an OVD service such as adapter or mapping.

Event.name: Delete

Event.name: Modify
Event.HelpText: Modify an LDAP object through ldapmodify operation.

Event.name: Rename
Event.HelpText: Change the DN of an LDAP object through ldapmoddn operation.
